## Environment
- **OS**: [e.g., Windows 11, macOS, Linux]
- **PowerShell Version**: [run `$PSVersionTable.PSVersion`]

- **Az.Resources Version**: [run `Get-Module Az.Resources -ListAvailable | Select Version`]
